00014 struct Skill

00016   struct SKDTstruct
00017   {
00018     int attribute;     // see defs.hpp
00019     int specialization;// 0 - Combat, 1 - Magic, 2 - Stealth
00020     float useValue[4]; // How much skill improves through use. Meaning
00021                        // of each field depends on what skill this
00022                        // is. We should document this better later.
00023   }; // Total size: 24 bytes
00024   SKDTstruct data;
00025 
00026   // Skill index. Skils don't have an id ("NAME") like most records,
00027   // they only have a numerical index that matches one of the
00028   // hard-coded skills in the game.
00029   int index;
00030 
00031   std::string description;
00032 
00033   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00034     {
00035       esm.getHNT(data, "SKDT", 24);
00036       description = esm.getHNOString("DESC");
00037     }
00038 };
00039 }
